name: Michael Westcott
headline: Software + Solutions
blurb: I solve problems. I create relevant and engaging experiences. I enjoy building new and innovative products and have a real interest the technology I use. My excellent communication skills allow me to easily understand requirements and deliver solutions that exceed clients' expectations.

roles.subtitle: DomaCom
roles.title: Digital Lead
roles.content: DomaCom is a Fintech startup who are developing a fractional investment online platform. My role here was developing and maintaining the client-facing application as well as the internal intranet applications, written in Angular and .NET CORE and hosted in the Azure cloud. As well as this, I had to develop web component libraries to allow sharing of code between our web application as well as our marketing site which was a Wordpress CMS.

roles.subtitle: Tredale
roles.title: Senior Development Consultant
roles.content: Tredale was a company specializing in Fintech solutions. In this role I was able to combine my domain knowledge of the finance industry, as well as my software development skills. I wrote applications using a Node.JS / Angular.JS / SQL Server platform with a bit of ASP.NET Web API when required

roles.subtitle: Imon Network (Beijing)
roles.title: Business Intelligence Manager
roles.content: Initially engaged to create analytics reports for their custom web application, my role was expanded to include redesigning and developing their real-time advertising system in node.js, as well as porting the web application to Zend Framework 2 and data model improvements.

roles.subtitle: Darwin Digital
roles.title: Technical Director
roles.content: Darwin Digital was a boutique digital agency based in Shenzhen, China. My role there consisted of running the PHP development team, mentoring in UI/UX, designing and developing solutions using the Drupal CMS as well as writing Ruby-on-Rails applications.

roles.subtitle: Bizmetrics
roles.title: Developer
roles.content: Bizmetrics was a company which provided business intelligence and reporting solutions for financial services companies. In this role I primarily worked on building client reporting packages using Crystal Reports as well as developed web portals using PHP and ASP.NET.

testimonialss.name: Jason Bryant
testimonialss.content: I have worked with Michael over many years on a wide variety of development projects, including Fintech platforms, Business Intelligence solutions and reporting packages. In all of these, Michael kicked some serious arse

testimonialss.name: Pita Oskam
testimonialss.position: Product manager (Strategy and execution to market)
testimonialss.content: Michael and I worked together numerous times.
